results.title: The Godfather
results.plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty in postwar New York City transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant youngest son.
results.stars: Francis Ford Coppola, Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, Diane Keaton

results.title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
results.plot: In the Fall of 1963, a Korean War veteran and criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rallies up the scared patients against the tyrannical nurse.
results.stars: Milos Forman, Jack Nicholson, Louise Fletcher, Michael Berryman, Peter Brocco

results.title: Taxi Driver
results.plot: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action.
results.stars: Martin Scorsese, Robert De Niro, Jodie Foster, Cybill Shepherd, Albert Brooks

results.title: Rocky
results.plot: A small-time Philadelphia boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight the world heavyweight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.
results.stars: John G. Avildsen, Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Burt Young, Carl Weathers

results.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
results.plot: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.
results.stars: George Lucas, Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Alec Guinness

results.title: A Clockwork Orange
results.plot: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.
results.stars: Stanley Kubrick, Malcolm McDowell, Patrick Magee, Michael Bates, Warren Clarke

results.title: Alien
results.plot: The crew of a commercial spacecraft encounter a deadly lifeform after investigating an unknown transmission.
results.stars: Ridley Scott, Sigourney Weaver, Tom Skerritt, John Hurt, Veronica Cartwright

results.title: The Exorcist
results.plot: When a 12 year old girl is possessed by a mysterious entity, her mother seeks the help of two priests to save her daughter.
results.stars: William Friedkin, Ellen Burstyn, Max von Sydow, Linda Blair, Lee J. Cobb

results.title: The Godfather Part II
results.plot: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.
results.stars: Francis Ford Coppola, Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Robert Duvall, Diane Keaton

results.title: Apocalypse Now
results.plot: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.
results.stars: Francis Ford Coppola, Martin Sheen, Marlon Brando, Robert Duvall, Frederic Forrest

results.title: Jaws
results.plot: When a killer shark unleashes chaos on a beach community off Cape Cod, it's up to a local sheriff, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer to hunt the beast down.
results.stars: Steven Spielberg, Roy Scheider, Robert Shaw, Richard Dreyfuss, Lorraine Gary

results.title: Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory
results.plot: A poor but hopeful boy seeks one of the five coveted golden tickets that will send him on a tour of Willy Wonka's mysterious chocolate factory.
results.stars: Mel Stuart, Gene Wilder, Jack Albertson, Peter Ostrum, Roy Kinnear

results.title: Blazing Saddles
results.plot: In order to ruin a western town, a corrupt politician appoints a black Sheriff, who promptly becomes his most formidable adversary.
results.stars: Mel Brooks, Cleavon Little, Gene Wilder, Slim Pickens, Harvey Korman

results.title: Deliverance
results.plot: Intent on seeing the Cahulawassee River before it's dammed and turned into a lake, outdoor fanatic Lewis Medlock takes his friends on a canoeing trip they'll never forget into the dangerous American back-country.
results.stars: John Boorman, Jon Voight, Burt Reynolds, Ned Beatty, Ronny Cox

results.title: The Deer Hunter
results.plot: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of several friends in a small steel mill town in Pennsylvania.
results.stars: Michael Cimino, Robert De Niro, Christopher Walken, John Cazale, John Savage

results.title: Chinatown
results.plot: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer in 1930s Los Angeles finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.
results.stars: Roman Polanski, Jack Nicholson, Faye Dunaway, John Huston, Perry Lopez

results.title: Life of Brian
results.plot: Born on the original Christmas in the stable next door to Jesus Christ, Brian of Nazareth spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.
results.stars: Terry Jones, Graham Chapman, John Cleese, Michael Palin, Terry Gilliam

results.title: Halloween
results.plot: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween night 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield, Illinois to kill again.
results.stars: John Carpenter, Donald Pleasence, Jamie Lee Curtis, Tony Moran, Nancy Kyes

results.title: The Sting
results.plot: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.
results.stars: George Roy Hill, Paul Newman, Robert Redford, Robert Shaw, Charles Durning

results.title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
results.plot: King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table embark on a surreal, low-budget search for the Holy Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.
results.stars: Terry Gilliam, Terry Jones, Graham Chapman, John Cleese, Eric Idle

results.title: Stalker
results.plot: A guide leads two men through an area known as the Zone to find a room that grants wishes.
results.stars: Andrei Tarkovsky, Alisa Freyndlikh, Aleksandr Kaydanovskiy, Anatoliy Solonitsyn, Nikolay Grinko

results.title: Barry Lyndon
results.plot: An Irish rogue wins the heart of a rich widow and assumes her dead husband's aristocratic position in 18th-century England.
results.stars: Stanley Kubrick, Ryan O'Neal, Marisa Berenson, Patrick Magee, Hardy Krüger

results.title: Dog Day Afternoon
results.plot: Three amateur bank robbers plan to hold up a bank. A nice simple robbery: Walk in, take the money, and run. Unfortunately, the supposedly uncomplicated heist suddenly becomes a bizarre nightmare as everything that could go wrong does.
results.stars: Sidney Lumet, Al Pacino, John Cazale, Penelope Allen, Sully Boyar

results.title: Papillon
results.plot: A French convict in the 1930s befriends a fellow criminal as the two of them begin serving their sentence in the South American penal colony on Devil's Island, which inspires the man to plot his escape.
results.stars: Franklin J. Schaffner, Steve McQueen, Dustin Hoffman, Victor Jory, Don Gordon

results.title: Young Frankenstein
results.plot: An American grandson of the infamous scientist, struggling to prove that his grandfather was not as insane as people believe, is invited to Transylvania, where he discovers the process that reanimates a dead body.
results.stars: Mel Brooks, Gene Wilder, Madeline Kahn, Marty Feldman, Peter Boyle

results.title: Dirty Harry
results.plot: When a man calling himself "the Scorpio Killer" menaces San Francisco, tough-as-nails Police Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan is assigned to track down the crazed psychopath.
results.stars: Don Siegel, Clint Eastwood, Andrew Robinson, Harry Guardino, Reni Santoni

results.title: The Holy Mountain
results.plot: In a corrupt, greed-fueled world, a powerful alchemist leads a messianic character and seven materialistic figures to the Holy Mountain, where they hope to achieve enlightenment.
results.stars: Alejandro Jodorowsky, Horacio Salinas, Zamira Saunders, Juan Ferrara

results.title: Network
results.plot: A television network cynically exploits a deranged former anchor's ravings and revelations about the news media for its own profit, but finds that his message may be difficult to control.
results.stars: Sidney Lumet, Faye Dunaway, William Holden, Peter Finch, Robert Duvall

results.title: The Conversation
results.plot: A paranoid, secretive surveillance expert has a crisis of conscience when he suspects that the couple he is spying on will be murdered.
results.stars: Francis Ford Coppola, Gene Hackman, John Cazale, Allen Garfield, Frederic Forrest

results.title: Enter the Dragon
results.plot: A Shaolin martial artist travels to an island fortress to spy on an opium lord - who is also a former monk from his temple - under the guise of attending a fighting tournament.
results.stars: Robert Clouse, Bruce Lee, John Saxon, Jim Kelly, Ahna Capri

results.title: Annie Hall
results.plot: Alvy Singer, a divorced Jewish comedian, reflects on his relationship with ex-lover Annie Hall, an aspiring nightclub singer, which ended abruptly just like his previous marriages.
results.stars: Woody Allen, Diane Keaton, Tony Roberts, Carol Kane

results.title: The French Connection
results.plot: A pair of NYPD detectives in the Narcotics Bureau stumble onto a heroin smuggling ring based in Marseilles, but stopping them and capturing their leaders proves an elusive goal.
results.stars: William Friedkin, Gene Hackman, Roy Scheider, Fernando Rey, Tony Lo Bianco

results.title: Serpico
results.plot: An honest New York cop named Frank Serpico blows the whistle on rampant corruption in the force only to have his comrades turn against him.
results.stars: Sidney Lumet, Al Pacino, John Randolph, Jack Kehoe, Biff McGuire

results.title: All the President's Men
results.plot: "The Washington Post" reporters Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein uncover the details of the Watergate scandal that leads to President Richard Nixon's resignation.
results.stars: Alan J. Pakula, Dustin Hoffman, Robert Redford, Jack Warden, Martin Balsam

results.title: Cabaret
results.plot: A female girlie club entertainer in Weimar Republic era Berlin romances two men while the Nazi Party rises to power around them.
results.stars: Bob Fosse, Liza Minnelli, Michael York, Helmut Griem, Joel Grey

results.title: Solaris
results.plot: A psychologist is sent to a station orbiting a distant planet in order to discover what has caused the crew to go insane.
results.stars: Andrei Tarkovsky, Natalya Bondarchuk, Donatas Banionis, Jüri Järvet, Vladislav Dvorzhetskiy

results.title: Fiddler on the Roof
results.plot: In pre-revolutionary Russia, a Jewish peasant with traditional values contends with marrying off three of his daughters with modern romantic ideals while growing anti-Semitic sentiment threatens his village.
results.stars: Norman Jewison, Topol, Norma Crane, Leonard Frey, Molly Picon

results.title: The Outlaw Josey Wales
results.plot: Missouri farmer Josey Wales joins a Confederate guerrilla unit and winds up on the run from the Union soldiers who murdered his family.
results.stars: Clint Eastwood, Sondra Locke, Chief Dan George, Bill McKinney

results.title: Kramer vs. Kramer
results.plot: After his wife leaves him, a work-obsessed Manhattan advertising executive is forced to learn long-neglected parenting skills, but a heated custody battle over the couple's young son deepens the wounds left by the separation.
results.stars: Robert Benton, Dustin Hoffman, Meryl Streep, Jane Alexander, Justin Henry

results.title: Being There
results.plot: After the death of his employer forces him out of the only home he's ever known, a simpleminded, sheltered gardener becomes an unlikely trusted advisor to a powerful tycoon and an insider in Washington politics.
results.stars: Hal Ashby, Peter Sellers, Shirley MacLaine, Melvyn Douglas, Jack Warden

results.title: The Last Picture Show
results.plot: In 1951, a group of high schoolers come of age in a bleak, isolated, atrophied North Texas town that is slowly dying, both culturally and economically.
results.stars: Peter Bogdanovich, Timothy Bottoms, Jeff Bridges, Cybill Shepherd, Ben Johnson

results.title: Dawn of the Dead
results.plot: During an escalating zombie epidemic, two Philadelphia SWAT team members, a traffic reporter and his TV executive girlfriend seek refuge in a secluded shopping mall.
results.stars: George A. Romero, David Emge, Ken Foree, Scott H. Reiniger, Gaylen Ross

results.title: Harold and Maude
results.plot: Young, rich, and obsessed with death, Harold finds himself changed forever when he meets lively septuagenarian Maude at a funeral.
results.stars: Hal Ashby, Ruth Gordon, Bud Cort, Vivian Pickles, Cyril Cusack

results.title: Patton
results.plot: The World War II phase of the career of controversial American general George S. Patton.
results.stars: Franklin J. Schaffner, George C. Scott, Karl Malden, Stephen Young, Michael Strong

results.title: All That Jazz
results.plot: Director/choreographer Bob Fosse tells his own life story as he details the sordid career of Joe Gideon, a womanizing, drug-using dancer.
results.stars: Bob Fosse, Roy Scheider, Jessica Lange, Ann Reinking, Leland Palmer

results.title: The Day of the Jackal
results.plot: In the aftermath of France allowing Algeria's independence, a group of resentful military veterans hire a professional assassin codenamed "Jackal" to kill President Charles de Gaulle.
results.stars: Fred Zinnemann, Edward Fox, Terence Alexander, Michel Auclair, Alan Badel

results.title: The Message
results.plot: This epic historical drama chronicles the life and times of Prophet Muhammad and serves as an introduction to early Islamic history.
results.stars: Moustapha Akkad, Anthony Quinn, Irene Papas, Michael Ansara, Johnny Sekka

results.title: Badlands
results.plot: An impressionable teenage girl from a dead-end town, and her older greaser boyfriend, embark on a killing spree in the South Dakota Badlands.
results.stars: Terrence Malick, Martin Sheen, Sissy Spacek, Warren Oates, Ramon Bieri

results.title: Mirror
results.plot: A dying man in his forties remembers his past. His childhood, his mother, the war, personal moments and things that tell of the recent history of all the Russian nation.
results.stars: Andrei Tarkovsky, Margarita Terekhova, Filipp Yankovskiy, Ignat Daniltsev, Oleg Yankovskiy

results.title: Days of Heaven
results.plot: A hot-tempered farm laborer convinces the woman he loves to marry their rich but dying boss so that they can have a claim to his fortune.
results.stars: Terrence Malick, Richard Gere, Brooke Adams, Sam Shepard, Linda Manz
